abilities.name: Mischief Makers
abilities.rule: Each time an enemy unit (excluding **TITANIC** units) within Engagement Range of one or more units with this ability is selected to fight, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes a melee attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
